title: Help me please!
body: Hello I've been playing league for a while now though my account is in the NA server whilst I am Swedish the server for me lags and I wish to change server to EUW, are there any other method going there for free? since I do not have the funds to pay for it. I remember as well, a while ago you were able to change to EUW for free if my memory serves me correctly. I rather not create a new account and play my self back up to level 30. It requires a lot of time which I do not have.

replies.body: Thanks Porocles for your help. I did a ticket.

I don't believe we are offering any free transfers right now, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in case we can work something out.  Playing on NA from such a far physical location will certainly cause some higher pings, so hopefully something can be worked out.
